contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Quiers-sur-Bézonde |image = |caption = |image coat of arms = Blason_ville_fr_Quiers-sur-Bézonde_(Loiret).svg |coat of arms legend = Quiers-sur-Bézonde#Héraldique |image coat of arms size = 100 |region = [[Région Centre|Centre]] |department = [[Loiret (département)|Loiret]] |arrondissement = [[Arrondissement of Montargis|Montargis]] |canton = [[Canton of Bellegarde|Bellegarde]] |INSEE = 45259 |postal code = 45270 |mayor = Éric Petat |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = [[Communauté de communes du Bellegardois]] |longitude = 2.4378 |latitude = 47.9992 |elevation min m = 104 |elevation max m = 135 |area km2 = 16.61 |population = 1122 |population date = 2006 |demonym = Quierois |website = }} '''Quiers-sur-Bézonde''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Loiret]] [[Departments of France|department]] in north-central [[France]]. ==See also== *[[Communes of the Loiret department]] {{Loiret communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Quiers-Sur-Bezonde}} [[Category:Communes of Loiret|Quierssurbezonde]] {{Loiret-geo-stub}}
